i18n.key: restric to products from the shelve
Select yes to limit the list of compared products that belong to the current shelve or one of its sub-shelve.
Shows or hides add to the basket button.
add to the basket via popin
Shows or hides a popin before adding the product to the basket.
Shows or hides a quantity selector. The selector requests javascript activation into user's browser.
Shows or hides add to favourite products list button.
